title: GS Mikami: Gokuraku Daisakusen!! (Ghost Sweeper Mikami Movie)
synopsis: Her name is Mikami and she is a Ghost Sweeper by profession. She's also the sexiest exorcist/bounty hunter you will ever meet! When an evil vampire sorcerer returns to Tokyo after a 100-year absence, Mikami is hired to track him and his menacing assistant down before they take over the city.
characters: ['Mikami, Reiko', 'Yokoshima, Tadao', 'Nosferatu', 'Himuro, Kinu', 'Mori, Ranmaru', 'Yakuchin', 'de Bloodeau, Pietro', 'Karasu, Kazuhiro']
staff: [['Umezawa, Atsutoshi', ['Director']], ['Okui, Masami', ['Theme Song Performance']], ['Hosoda, Mamoru', ['Key Animation']], ['Kagami, Takahiro', ['Key Animation']]]
